field.name: Counsel Mother on the Importance of Giving ONLY Breast Milk
Important to feed baby the first yellowish milk known as colostrum
Colostrum protects babies from many diseases
Breast milk provides all the food and water your baby needs during the first 6 months
Do not give anything else, not even water, including bottled water, sachet water, gripe water, and herbal concoctions, such as walga
Even during hot weather, breast milk will satisfy baby’s thirst
Giving other liquids will cause your baby to suckle less and will reduce amount of breast milk you produce
Giving water, other liquids and foods in the first 6 months can make your baby sick
You can give medicines that your health provider recommends
